tweets.text:
So the @EnvAgency has published its annual report, 5 months late.

Apparently they "Have achieved a huge amount over the last year", obviously including, not a single river in England reaches 'Good' overall environmental health.

Spent £1.431 billion and employed 10,229 staff. https://t.co/0aEhhtaw8p
Twitter has felt rather bleak for the past week, so here’s some #Singapore #otters out for their morning run. https://t.co/7otq7kwsuE

tweets.text: An @EnvAgencyYNE flood alert has been issued in the Upper Calder. This is a precautionary alert as there is some uncertainty around the volume of snowmelt overnight. Updates will be provided here and on https://t.co/SOPqHGairw as the situation changes. https://t.co/uYtSdlmQRH

The historic concrete culvert in a tributary of the Torridge represented a barrier to fish movement. The old quarry track was no longer used and the landowner agreed to the culverts removal, opening up >2km of watercourse upstream to fish @EnvAgency #WEG #TRRP https://t.co/8096LIr5kJ

urls.title: Official figures reveal not one river or lake in England is in good health
urls.description: Official figures reveal not one river or lake in England is in good health

tweets.text: New @EnvAgency figures reveal today that 0% of rivers and lakes in England are now classed in good health. tweets.text: Our #TRRP team worked alongside this landowner, Glenn, to install the sediment ponds to trap small volumes of sediment from the yard AND they also help with natural flood management @EnvAgency #Torridge #WEG https://t.co/ByCJ9mI1wk

@UnderwaterMedia @CleanIlkley @rivercide_live But it rained exceptionally ... about three weeks ago. Truth is the water companies and @EnvAgency are complicit in using our rivers as open sewers. It is a national disgrace.

@MerryAlbright @bettwsresident @timthefruit @EnvAgencyMids @HelenStace_HWT I thought silage slurry and digestates had systems in place to ensure they were safely stored and as such posed no risk to aquatic life?

Due to increased rain fall in the area and rising river levels on the #RiverTees we have closed phase 1 & 2 flood gates at #Yarm We have also issued a flood alert for the Lower River Tees. tweets.text:
#NaturalFloodManagement can help reduce #floodrisk without greatly altering production levels or land management practices. #NFM options for landowners are described in this booklet: https://t.co/JQXEmrU7Ax

@CaBAtweets @nwgrnd_Flood @EnvAgencyNW @HeritageFundNW @WestCumbriaRT https://t.co/X9Uf8CVU4M

@timthefruit @MerryAlbright @iamjennie58 @EnvAgencyMids @HelenStace_HWT BOD is microbes eating the food and using up the oxygen and cold water checks this. A milk tanker spill can kill a whole river in the summer eg Eden 1995, but not kill a single invert if the water temp is near 0 eg: Wye 2016  It is in summer low flows that high BOD devastates.

tweets.text:
Yesterday six park rangers have been killed at the Virunga National Park in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

Killed while were on foot patrolling. This centre is specially made for orphan rare mountain gorillas. About 200+ rangers killed here in recent years. Green soldiers 🙏🏼 https://t.co/Q4HyilMDa8

tweets.text: @MerryAlbright @iamjennie58 @bettwsresident @EnvAgencyMids @HelenStace_HWT Only small amounts. Main problem is all the carbohydrates in it. This creates a massive Biological Oxygen Demand (BOD) due to the bacterial composition of the effluent. Leading in turn to depleted O levels and fish, etc death. It can have a BOD 200 times that of untreated sewage!
@BardOfNorfolk @EnvAgencyAnglia Fishing is still allowed during lockdown, check the Angling Trust website for more details.

tweets.text: This evening we are operating the riverside flood gates along the River #Ouse in #York to help reduce flood risk to local properties after recent rainfall and melting snow increased local river levels. Learn more about flood alerts and warnings web-link https://t.co/GEqDRnfqgA https://t.co/sTQbOepjK0

@DefraGovUK @TonyJuniper @NaturalEngland @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @williamrworsley @ForestryEngland Perhaps the best way would be to limit flights??  One flight to the Far East has the same carbon footprint as a whole years food (person)

tweets.text:
@DefraGovUK @TonyJuniper @NaturalEngland @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @williamrworsley @ForestryEngland The @N8research #NetZeroNorth programme will build on the strengths of our region to ‘build back better’ and accelerate the transition to net-zero. You can take a look at the projects already well underway within our partnership here:

https://t.co/3DWTxOTyWk

We have ceased additional pumping now that all water has been removed from Currymoor. Normal pumping routine has re-established but the extra pumps will remain in place for the mean time should they be needed. https://t.co/HyM8eV7Bv9
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency I worked out that the budget at the EA is about £140,000 per head. Once you have paid salaries and consultants there is not much left over to actually do anything.

💧 Very pleased to back my @Conservatives colleague @Dunne4Ludlow on his Sewage (Inland Waters) Bill which places duty on water companies to ensure untreated sewage is not discharged into rivers & other inland waters. Bill comes to @HouseofCommons on Fri 22 Jan 👍

@CleanIlkley

@Feargal_Sharkey @Matthew_Wright @EnvAgency They've achieved a HUGE amount of spending that's for sure..but just like the Government not much to show for it...

urls.title: Waste carriers, brokers and dealers
urls.description: beta This is a trial service – your feedback will help us to improve it. Home Search waste carriers, brokers and dealers People or businesses who transport, buy, sell or dispose of waste, or arrange for someone els e to do so, must be registered. To check a registration, enter the registration number or business name: only carry waste they produced in the course of carrying out their business unless it is construction or demolition waste only carry (carrier), arrange (broker) or deal (dealer) in: animal

tweets.text:
Illegal waste carriers undermine legitimate businesses, undercut their prices and blight the #environment

You may also be prosecuted for letting them take your waste so always check their credentials online here - 
https://t.co/IzkQHCXIeA

#WasteCrime https://t.co/PZk80pM7iV

Read this important piece from @TonyJuniper from  @NaturalEngland
@EmmaHowardBoyd from @EnvAgency @williamrworsley from @ForestryEngland 
About why we have to use this opportunity to lead the way in protecting the natural world & our environment  💚
https://t.co/Sv3AXjBzNy

Meanwhile back in the real world the @EnvAgency have applied for an abstraction licence.

Why? To pump water from the aquifer into a river that is, wait for it, wait for it, over abstracted by the water industry.  You can't make this sh*t up.

PS, the river is also full of it. https://t.co/1xdVY2Ozhc https://t.co/uN3GBq4qiL
